last_episode_to_air.name: Peter Grill and the Future Legacy
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Guildmaster’s plan pays off! Fortunately for Peter (but unfortunately for everyone else), the Dwarves’ natural predator chooses this moment to attack the ceremony.

name: Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time
original_name: ピーター・グリルと賢者の時間
overview: Upon winning a fighting tournament and being crowned the world’s strongest warrior, Peter Grill discovers a downside to his newfound fame. Women of all species, from ogres to elves, are scrambling over each other for his seed to ensure they have the strongest babies possible. Poor Peter just wants to settle down with his lovey dovey fiancée, but he’ll have to outmatch, outwit, and outrun a harem of very determined monster girls to do so!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Ogre Sisters
episodes.overview: As the strongest man in the world, Peter must rise to the occasion and fend off not one, but two ogresses who want his peter.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Future Father-in-Law
episodes.overview: Peter's situation just keeps getting worse. The orgresses were a handful enough, but now he's facing the wrath of a future father-in-law!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and Relationships with Elves
episodes.overview: Lisa warned Peter that other nations would soon proposition him. Waking up and finding an elf in his bed proves she was right.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and Bathing Etiquette
episodes.overview: Please seek immediate elven attention for curses lasting more than four hours.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and a Blind Date with an Orc
episodes.overview: The guildmaster’s latest scheme involves a political marriage between Peter and an ugly orc. Peter thinks he’s safe from temptation, but beauty is in the eye of the beholder.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Orc's True Character
episodes.overview: Peter’s in quite the pickle this time. On one hand, he knows exactly what the guildmaster is trying to do. But on the other, Piglette really wants Peter to pick her pepper.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Battle of the Fates
episodes.overview: What do ogres, orcs and elves all have in common? They hate each other. Peter has absolutely no idea what he’s gotten himself into.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Secret Treaty
episodes.overview: All Peter wants is a romantic date with Luvellia. Is that too much to ask? Why yes, yes it is.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Treaty's Aftermath
episodes.overview: Peter can't take it any longer and is about to crack like an egg!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Angry Megaton Axe
episodes.overview: Lisa's past finally catches up to her and Peter gets caught in the fallout. Why? Because life is contractually obligated to give him a hard time, that's why.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and Dueling Manners
episodes.overview: Why Peter, you wouldn't be thinking about throwing the match, right? Who knows what could happen if your ill-advised plan to get rid of the Ogre sisters were to backfire...

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Warrior that Shouted Love
episodes.overview: Peter has no choice. If he wants to rid himself of Lisa once and for all, he must become the ultimate wingman and help Spartokos get laid.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Goblin Apocalypse
episodes.overview: Did someone say goblins? Peter just received orders to hold back a horde of female goblins invading the countryside.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Goblin Who Returned the Favor
episodes.overview: While Peter weeps in his cell, an Elite Hobgoblin named Gobuko unexpectedly comes to his rescue. It’s almost as though she’s got something on her mind…

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Only Neat Thing to Do
episodes.overview: When humans successfully route the horde, is extermination the only solution? This looks like a job for a completely different kind of goblin slayer!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the World’s Strongest Little Sister
episodes.overview: Lucy Grill certainly has a lot of guts. Why, she’ll just go berserk if she ever finds out her brother cheated on Luvellia!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and Family Ties
episodes.overview: Peter’s already complicated life grows more so when Lucy joins the Warriors Guild. He needs to be extra careful now!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Enjoyment of the Spa Resort
episodes.overview: Peter needs a break after everything he’s gone through. Unfortunately for him, certain someones have other plans.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and a Family Disgraced
episodes.overview: After being abducted from the spa resort, Peter awakens and stands before Vegan’s sister! Three guesses what she wants.

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Sisterly Feud
episodes.overview: Vegan won’t just stand around and let her sister take Peter away!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Essence of an Apology
episodes.overview: Vegan and Fulltalia's sibling rivalry is getting out of hand!

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Dwarven Alliance
episodes.overview: The Guildmaster vows to acknowledge Peter if he reaffirms the Guild’s alliance with the Dwarves? Peter smells a trap...

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Inescapable Room
episodes.overview: Peter and Misslim get locked in a room together, and the only way they can escape is by performing a suspiciously specific action…

episodes.name: Peter Grill and the Future Legacy
episodes.overview: The Guildmaster’s plan pays off! Fortunately for Peter (but unfortunately for everyone else), the Dwarves’ natural predator chooses this moment to attack the ceremony.
